flawed_nl_solution:
If rice weighed 30 kg less than the green beans, then the total rice weight is 60 kg - 30 kg = 30 kg
If the green beans weighed 10 kg more than sugar, then the total sugar weight is 60 kg - 10 kg = <<60-10=30>>30 kg
When 1/3 weight of rice was lost, the weight loss became 1/3*30 = <<1/3*30=10>>10kg
The weight of rice after the loss is 30 kg - 10 kg = <<30-10=20>>20 kg.
When 1/5 weight of sugar was lost, the lost weight was 1/5 * 30 kg = <<1/5*30=6>>6 kg
The weight of sugar after the loss is 30 kg - 6 kg = <<30-6=24>>24 kg.
The total weight for all the items is 24 kg + 20 kg + 60 kg = <<24+20+60=104>>104 kg
#### 104

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 30. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
